name: VNC Server (Reflective Injection), Hidden Bind TCP Stager
author: sf <stephen_fewer@harmonysecurity.com>
hdm <x@hdm.io>

description:
Inject a VNC Dll via a reflective loader (staged).

Listen for a connection from a hidden port and spawn a command shell to the allowed host.
